quest: When was a Turing machine invented?
quest_zh: 圖靈機是什麼時候發明的？

quest: Which TWO did the Romans establish in Britain?
quest_zh: 羅馬人在英國建立了哪兩個？

quest: Can the devolved administrations control sectors such as immigration, foreign affairs and taxation?
quest_zh: 權力下放的政府可以控制移民，外交和稅收等部門嗎？

answers.answer: Only if the local people support them

quest: Rudyard Kipling reflected the idea that the British Empire was a force for good
quest_zh: 魯德亞德·吉卜林（Rudyard Kipling）反映了大英帝國是善良的力量的想法

quest: Volunteering is compulsory in the UK
quest_zh: 在英國，志願服務是強制性的

quest: Which TWO are NOT part of the UK?
quest_zh: 哪兩個不是英國的一部分？

quest: When did the British troops leave Iraq?
quest_zh: 英軍何時離開伊拉克？

quest: Which of these countries was NOT UK's ally in the WWII?
quest_zh: 這些國家中的哪一個不是第二次世界大戰中的英國盟友？

quest: How many people lost their lives in Northern Ireland in the decades after 1969?
quest_zh: 1969年後的幾十年中，有多少人在北愛爾蘭喪生？

quest: The British constitution is described as 'unwritten'
quest_zh: 英國憲法被描述為“不成文”

quest: When William of Orange re-conquered Ireland (in 1690) he took the title 'William the Conqueror'
quest_zh: 當奧蘭治的威廉重新征服愛爾蘭時（1690年），他以“威廉·征服者”冠軍頭銜

quest: What does St Patrick's cross look like?
quest_zh: 聖帕特里克的十字架是什麼樣的？

answers.answer: A red cross on a white ground
answers.answer_zh: 白色地面上的紅十字會

answers.answer: A diagonal red cross on a white ground
answers.answer_zh: 白色地面上的對角線紅十字會

answers.answer: A diagonal white cross on a blue ground
answers.answer_zh: 藍色地面上的對角線白色十字架

quest: In what county can you see a hill fort at Maiden Castle?
quest_zh: 您可以在哪個縣看到少女城堡的山堡堡？

quest: How many members does the Welsh Assembly have?
quest_zh: 威爾士議會有幾個成員？

quest: The burial place of one of the kings was at Sutton Hoo in modern Suffolk
quest_zh: 其中一個國王的葬禮在現代薩福克的薩頓侯

quest: Robert the Bruce is associated with which country?
quest_zh: 羅伯特·布魯斯（Bruce）與哪個國家有聯繫？

quest: After the Emancipation Act, how many Indian and Chinese workers were employed to replace the slaves?
quest_zh: 在《解放法》之後，有多少印度和中國工人被用來取代奴隸？

quest: What prehistoric village (off the north coast of Scotland) has helped archaeologists to understand more about how people lived near the end of the Stone Age?
quest_zh: 哪個史前村莊（蘇格蘭北部海岸）幫助考古學家更多地了解了人們如何在石器時代結束時生活？

answers.answer_zh: 斯卡拉·布雷（Skara Brae）在奧克尼（Orkney）

quest: The Scottish Parliament (after the Magna Carta was established in England) was spilt into two estates: the Lords and the Commons
quest_zh: 蘇格蘭議會（在英格蘭建立大憲章之後）被灑成兩個莊園：上議院和下議院

quest: Which TWO roles are school governors and school boards responsible for?
quest_zh: 負責學校的州長和學校董事會是哪個兩個角色？

answers.answer: Setting the strategic direction of the school

quest: Oliver Cromwell took the title 'King of Ireland'
quest_zh: 奧利弗·克倫威爾（Oliver Cromwell）以“愛爾蘭國王”的冠軍頭銜

quest: Who was Robert Burns?
quest_zh: 羅伯特·伯恩斯是誰？

quest: Who led a team of scientists to develop the atomic bomb?
quest_zh: 誰帶領一組科學家開發了原子彈？

quest: When were the Anglo-Saxon kingdoms established in England?
quest_zh: 盎格魯 - 撒克遜王國什麼時候在英國建立？
